Parrish Get Featured Join the Business Network List Your Nonprofit Suggest a Listing Pitch An Article Add an Event Login send email Visit website Restaurants & Nightlife Freckled Fin Irish Pub Freckled Fin Irish Pub & Music Hall is located on Anna Maria Island and is a full-service Irish Pub. We Have 12 beers on tap with 3 rotating local selections along with Irish favorites! We also have Classic Irish dishes as well as fresh local seafood, sandwiches, salads, and more! Come see why we’re known as “The Cheers of Anna Maria Island.” We offer live music, indoor and outdoor seating, and super-friendly service! Irish Pub in Anna Maria Island | Florida Dreams Skip to main content 941-462-4016 My Rentals Recently Viewed (0) Rentals Anna Maria Island Rentals View By Bedrooms 1 Bedroom 2 Bedrooms 3 Bedrooms 4+ Bedrooms View By Type Condos Homes Pet Friendly Rentals with A Pool Luxury Rentals View By Location Anna Maria Holmes Beach Bradenton Beach Bradenton All Rentals Availability Calendar Featured Properties Travel Insurance Specials Sales Our Listings Florida Dreams Real Estate MLS Search Contact an Agent Things to Do Get Ideas Activities & Attractions Events & Happenings Restaurants & Dining Sports & Outdoors 10% OFF Incentives Island Gems Property Management About About Us About Anna Maria Island Contact Us The Best Irish Pub in Anna Maria Island Though Anna Maria Island is a hidden gem in Florida, it definitely has distinct qualities that it is known for. The laid-back atmosphere is the Island’s main attraction, allowing visitors to truly get away from the hustle and bustle of daily life. AMI is full of beautiful, relaxing beaches, unique shopping opportunities, and of course, some incredible food. When you think of eating on a Florida vacation, your first thought is probably seafood; more than likely, you don’t think about having great Irish pub food. But on Anna Maria Island, one of the biggest attractions is Freckled Fin Irish Pub, an authentic European eatery in the heart of Florida and just minutes away from our vacation rentals on Anna Maria Island . History Photo from Shutterstock Freckled Fin gets its name from an old Irish legend. The story goes that, in a small island off the coast of Ireland, a mermaid was caught by a local fisherman who wanted to take her for his bride. Left alone with seemingly no other option, the mermaid agreed and gave the fishermen seven human children, the youngest of which was a daughter named Fin. Fin was very fast and fluid in the water, and her mother revealed her secret of being a mermaid. Fin left home and found a ship being lured in by sirens. She saved the captain and eventually came to the Gulf of Mexico where she met a group of humans that were supposedly the first to discover what we know of today as Anna Maria Island. The tribes nicknamed the mermaid the Freckled Fin, and she went on to save many more sailors throughout her lifetime. This rich legend has bled into the culture of the Freckled Fin Irish Pub, as it maintains the same bold and free spirit as the mermaid. Food At the Freckled Fin, you will find the perfect blend of traditional Irish grub and fresh local seafood . Shepherd’s Pie and steak on a stick are European staples, or you can try something from the sea like the Gulf Mahi Tacos or the Smoke on the Water sandwich. You’ll also find selections like poutine, nachos, salads, sandwiches, pizza, and more. Freckled Fin has an extensive drink menu, full of Irish ales as well as domestic brews, wine, and liquor. Entrees cost around $15 each, so you can get great cuisine without breaking the bank. You definitely won’t leave the Freckled Fin hungry! Entertainment Not only can you get a great meal at the Freckled Fin, but you can stick around and enjoy some great entertainment as well. Throughout the week, Freckled Fin is proud to host local musicians for you to enjoy while you eat. Just a few of their acts include Acoustic Thunder, Raw Vinyl, and Kettle of Fish. Musical acts are always being updated, so be sure to visit their website or their Facebook page for an up-to-date listing. Plan Your Visit We are proud to serve guests visiting Anna Maria, and we have rental options that will meet your every need. For more information on local restaurants and our Anna Maria Island rentals with a pool , contact us today! View All Rentals The Freckled Fin Irish Pub is located at 5337 Gulf Drive North in Holmes Beach . They’re open Sunday through Thursday from 11 a.m. until 11 p.m., and Friday through Saturday from 11 a.m. until 2 am. Book Your Anna Maria Island Rental Freckled Fin has been a staple in Anna Maria Island since 2015, and it is just one of the countless food and entertainment options you’ll find on the island. No matter what kind of cuisine you’re in the mood for, you will find it just minutes from our Anna Maria Island vacation rentals .
